author: cnbc.com
title: TearLab reports 4Q loss
text:
SAN DIEGO (AP) _ TearLab Corp. (TEAR) on Friday reported a loss of $4 million in its fourth quarter.
On a per-share basis, the San Diego-based company said it had a loss of 63 cents. Losses, adjusted for asset impairment costs, came to 55 cents per share.
The ophthalmic device company posted revenue of $6.9 million in the period.
For the year, the company reported that its loss narrowed to $16.1 million, or $2.78 per share. Revenue was reported as $27.1 million.
The company's shares closed at 28 cents. A year ago, they were trading at $4.94.
